net.sf.mmm.persistence.base

Class AbstractRevisionedPersistenceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractComponent
      • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractLoggableComponent
        • net.sf.mmm.persistence.base.AbstractPersistenceManager
          • net.sf.mmm.persistence.base.AbstractRevisionedPersistenceManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PersistenceManager, RevisionedPersistenceManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PersistenceManagerImplJpa

    public abstract class AbstractRevisionedPersistenceManager
extends AbstractPersistenceManager
implements RevisionedPersistenceManager
    This is the abstract base-implementation of the RevisionedPersistenceManager interface.
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Detail

      • getRevisionedManager

        public <ID,ENTITY extends RevisionedEntity<ID>> RevisionedDao<ID,ENTITY> getRevisionedManager(Class<ENTITY> entityClass)
                                                                                       throws ObjectNotFoundException
        This method gets the individual RevisionedDao responsible for the given entityClass.
        Specified by:
        getRevisionedManager in interface RevisionedPersistenceManager
        Type Parameters:
        ID - is the type of the primary key.
        ENTITY - is the generic entity-type.
        Parameters:
        entityClass - is the type of the RevisionedEntity for which the according GenericDao is requested.
        Returns:
        the GenericDao responsible for the given entityClass.
        Throws:
        ObjectNotFoundException - if the requested manager could NOT be found.

      • load

        public <ID,ENTITY extends RevisionedEntity<ID>> ENTITY load(Class<ENTITY> entityClass,
                                                            ID id,
                                                            Number revision)
                                                     throws ObjectNotFoundException,
                                                            NlsUnsupportedOperationException
        This method loads the specified revision of the RevisionedEntity with the given entityClass and id from the persistent store.
        Specified by:
        load in interface RevisionedPersistenceManager
        Type Parameters:
        ID - is the type of the primary key.
        ENTITY - is the generic type of the entityClass.
        Parameters:
        entityClass - is the class reflecting the type of the requested entity.
        id - is the primary key of the requested entity.
        revision - is the revision of the requested entity or RevisionedEntity.LATEST_REVISION to get the latest revision.
        Returns:
        the requested entity. It is immutable if NOT the latest revision.
        Throws:
        ObjectNotFoundException - if the requested entity could NOT be found.
        NlsUnsupportedOperationException - if the given entityClass reflects a RevisionedEntity that is NOT revision-controlled.
        See Also:
        RevisionedDao.load(Object, Number)
